mapper.insert: insert into hz_apply_details (id, apply_id, lesson, school_time_start, school_time_end, use_vm_start_time, use_vm_end_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lesson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{schoolTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useVmStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useVmEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hz_apply_details set apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lesson = #{lesson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_time_start = #{schoolTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, school_time_end = #{schoolTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_vm_start_time = #{useVmStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_vm_end_time = #{useVmEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, apply_id, lesson, school_time_start, school_time_end, use_vm_start_time, use_vm_end_time from hz_apply_details where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
